Otherwise will throw an exception when calling ReportProgress method  Di2015NewLine            backgroundWorker1.WorkerReportsProgress = true;   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //mandatory. Otherwise we would get an InvalidOperationException when trying to cancel the operation  Di2015NewLine            backgroundWorker1.WorkerSupportsCancellation = true;  Di2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //This method is executed in a separate thread created by the background worker.  Di2015NewLine        //so don't try to access any UI controls here!! (unless you use a delegate to do it)  Di2015NewLine        //this attribute will prevent the debugger to stop here if any exception is raised.  Di2015NewLine        //[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerNonUserCodeAttribute()]  Di2015NewLine        private void backgroundWorker1_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)  Di2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine            //NOTE: we shouldn't use a try catch block here (unless you rethrow the exception)  Di2015NewLine            //the backgroundworker will be able to detect any exception on this code.  Di2015NewLine            //if any exception is produced, it will be available to you on   Di2015NewLine            //the RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs object, method backgroundWorker1_RunWorkerCompleted  Di2015NewLine            //try  Di2015NewLine            //{  Di2015NewLine                DateTime start = DateTime.Now;  Di2015NewLine                e.Result = "";  Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++)  Di2015NewLine                {  Di2015NewLine                    System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(50); //do some intense task here.  Di2015NewLine                    backgroundWorker1.ReportProgress(i, DateTime.Now); //notify progress to main thread. We also pass time information in UserState to cover this property in the example.  Di2015NewLine                    //Error handling: uncomment this code if you want to test how an exception is handled by the background worker.  Di2015NewLine                    //also uncomment the mentioned attribute above to it doesn't stop in the debugger.  Di2015NewLine                    //if (i == 34)  Di2015NewLine                    //    throw new Exception("something wrong here!!");  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //if cancellation is pending, cancel work.  Di2015NewLine                    if (backgroundWorker1.CancellationPending)  Di2015NewLine                    {  Di2015NewLine                        e.Cancel = true;   Di2015NewLine                        return;  Di2015NewLine                    }  Di2015NewLine                }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                TimeSpan duration = DateTime.Now - start;  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //we could return some useful information here, like calculation output, number of items affected, etc.. to the main thread.  Di2015NewLine                e.Result = "Duration: " + duration.TotalMilliseconds.ToString() + " ms.";  Di2015NewLine            //}  Di2015NewLine            //catch(Exception ex){  Di2015NewLine            //    MessageBox.Show("Don't use try catch here, let the backgroundworker handle it for you!");  Di2015NewLine            //}  Di2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //This event is raised on the main thread.  Di2015NewLine        //It is safe to access UI controls here.  Di2015NewLine        private void backgroundWorker1_ProgressChanged(object sender,   Di2015NewLine            ProgressChangedEventArgs e)  Di2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine            progressBar1.Value = e.ProgressPercentage; //update progress bar  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DateTime time = Convert.ToDateTime(e.UserState); //get additional information about progress  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //in this example, we log that optional additional info to textbox  Di2015NewLine            txtOutput.AppendText(time.ToLongTimeString());  Di2015NewLine            txtOutput.AppendText(Environment.NewLine);              Di2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //This is executed after the task is complete whatever the task has completed: a) sucessfully, b) with error c)has been cancelled  Di2015NewLine        private void backgroundWorker1_RunWorkerCompleted(object sender,   Di2015NewLine            RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)  Di2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine            if (e.Cancelled) {  Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("The task has been cancelled");  Di2015NewLine            }  Di2015NewLine            else if (e.Error != null)  Di2015NewLine            {                  Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("Error. Details: " + (e.Error as Exception).ToString());  Di2015NewLine            }  Di2015NewLine            else {  Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("The task has been completed. Results: " + e.Result.ToString());  Di2015NewLine            }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void btoCancel_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)  Di2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine            //notify background worker we want to cancel the operation.  Di2015NewLine            //this code doesn't actually cancel or kill the thread that is executing the job.  Di2015NewLine            backgroundWorker1.CancelAsync();  Di2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void btoStart_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)  Di2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine            backgroundWorker1.RunWorkerAsync();  Di2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLine

7462620Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class CacheHelperDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Insert value into the cache usingDi2015NewLine        /// appropriate name/value pairsDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="T">Type of cached item</typeparam>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="o">Item to be cached</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="key">Name of item</param>Di2015NewLine        public static void Add<T>(T o, string key, double Timeout)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Cache.Insert(Di2015NewLine                key,Di2015NewLine                o,Di2015NewLine                null,Di2015NewLine                DateTime.Now.AddMinutes(Timeout),Di2015NewLine                System.Web.Caching.Cache.NoSlidingExpiration);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Remove item from cacheDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="key">Name of cached item</param>Di2015NewLine        public static void Clear(string key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Cache.Remove(key);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Check for item in cacheDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="key">Name of cached item</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public static bool Exists(string key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return HttpContext.Current.Cache[key] != null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Retrieve cached itemDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="T">Type of cached item</typeparam>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="key">Name of cached item</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="value">Cached value. Default(T) if item doesn't exist.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Cached item as type</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static bool Get<T>(string key, out T value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!Exists(key))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    value = default(T);Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                value = (T)HttpContext.Current.Cache[key];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                value = default(T);Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7462987Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static uint[] RemoveRange(this uint[] source_array, uint[] entries_to_remove)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var referenceCount = new Dictionary<uint, int>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (uint n in source_array)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!referenceCount.ContainsKey(n))Di2015NewLine            referenceCount[n] = 1;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            referenceCount[n]++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (uint n in entries_to_remove)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (referenceCount.ContainsKey(n))Di2015NewLine            referenceCount[n]--;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return referenceCount.Where(x => x.Value > 0)Di2015NewLine                         .Select(x => Enumerable.Repeat(x.Key, x.Value))Di2015NewLine                         .SelectMany( x => x)Di2015NewLine                         .ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

i < src.Length - 3; i++){Di2015NewLine                var first = src[i];Di2015NewLine                var second = src[i+1];Di2015NewLine                var third = src[i+2];Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return top;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Node{Di2015NewLine        private readonly Node _parent;Di2015NewLine        private readonly Dictionary<char,Node> _children Di2015NewLine                         = new Dictionary<char, Node>();Di2015NewLine        private int _count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Node(Node parent){Di2015NewLine            _parent = parent;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Node AddChild(char value){Di2015NewLine            if (!_children.ContainsKey(value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _children.Add(value, new Node(this));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var levelNode = _children[value];Di2015NewLine            levelNode._count++;Di2015NewLine            return levelNode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public decimal Probability(string substring){Di2015NewLine            var node = this;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var c in substring){Di2015NewLine                if(!node.Contains(c))Di2015NewLine                    return 0m;Di2015NewLine                node = node[c];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return ((decimal) node._count)/node._parent._children.Count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Node this[char value]{Di2015NewLine            get { return _children[value]; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private bool Contains(char c){Di2015NewLine            return _children.ContainsKey(c);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7467922Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Convert the message body into a Hash valueDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="MessageBody">XElement holding all the message body XML nodes</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>a base 64 string representing the hash code</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate string GenerateMessageBodyHash(XElement MessageBody)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string hash = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using( MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream() )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XmlWriterSettings xws = new XmlWriterSettings();Di2015NewLine            xws.OmitXmlDeclaration = true;Di2015NewLine            xws.Indent = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using( XmlWriter xw = XmlWriter.Create( ms, xws ))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Assign the xml to be written to the writer and then memory streamDi2015NewLine                MessageBody.WriteTo(xw);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SHA256 shaM = new SHA256Managed();Di2015NewLine                hash = Convert.ToBase64String(shaM.ComputeHash( ms ));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Log.WriteLine(Category.Warning, "Exception detected generating the XML hash", ex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return hash;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7468470Di2015UniqueSeparator    private Model3DGroup CreateTriangleSide(Point3D p0, Point3D p1, Point3D p2, Material material)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MeshGeometry3D mesh = null;Di2015NewLine        GeometryModel3D model = null;Di2015NewLine        Model3DGroup group = new Model3DGroup();Di2015NewLine        Vector3D normal;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // Front side of jagged partDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        mesh = new MeshGeometry3D();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        mesh.Positions.Add(p0);Di2015NewLine        mesh.Positions.Add(p1);Di2015NewLine        mesh.Positions.Add(p2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        mesh.TriangleIndices.Add(0);Di2015NewLine        mesh.TriangleIndices.Add(1);Di2015NewLine        mesh.TriangleIndices.Add(2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        normal = CalculateNormal(p0, p1, p2);Di2015NewLine        normal = Normalize(normal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        mesh.Normals.Add(normal);Di2015NewLine        mesh.Normals.Add(normal);Di2015NewLine        mesh.Normals.Add(normal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        model = new GeometryModel3D(mesh, material);Di2015NewLine        group.Children.Add(model);Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // Front side of the surface below the jagged edgeDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        Point3D p3 = new Point3D(p1.X, p1.Y, bh);Di2015NewLine        Point3D p4 = new Point3D(p2.X, p2.Y, bh);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return group;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public const double RADDEGC = (Math.PI / 180.0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public enum ANGLETYPE { RAD, DEG };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*Di2015NewLine     * Takes the angle and the Z value to create a 3D point in spaceDi2015NewLine     * Di2015NewLine     * @param angle The angle Di2015NewLine     * @param radius The radius of the circle Di2015NewLine     * @param z The z valueDi2015NewLine     * @param t The angle type, for example RAD (radians) or DEG (degressDi2015NewLine     * Di2015NewLine     */Di2015NewLine    public static Point3D CP(double radius, double angle, double z = 0, ANGLETYPE angtype = ANGLETYPE.RAD)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Point3D p = new Point3D();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        p.Z = z;Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        if (angtype ==  ANGLETYPE.RAD)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p.X = radius * Math.Cos(angle);Di2015NewLine            p.Y = radius * Math.Sin(angle);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p.X = radius * Math.Cos(angle * RADDEGC);Di2015NewLine            p.Y = radius * Math.Sin(angle * RADDEGC);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return p;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Vector3D CalculateNormal(Point3D p0, Point3D p1, Point3D p2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Vector3D a1 = new Vector3D(p1.X - p0.X, p1.Y - p0.Y, p1.Z - p0.Z);Di2015NewLine        Vector3D b1 = new Vector3D(p2.X - p0.X, p2.Y - p0.Y, p2.Z - p0.Z);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Vector3D dir = Vector3D.CrossProduct(a1, b1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return dir;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Vector3D Normalize(Vector3D norm)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double fac1 = Math.Sqrt((norm.X * norm.X) + (norm.Y * norm.Y) + (norm.Z * norm.Z));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (fac1 == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return norm;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        norm = new Vector3D(norm.X / fac1, norm.Y / fac1, norm.Z / fac1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return norm;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7469323Di2015UniqueSeparatorDataTable Sale=new DataTable("sale");Di2015NewLineSale.Columns.Add("department",typeof(string));Di2015NewLineSale.Columns.Add("sale",typeof(double));Di2015NewLineSale.Rows.Add("a",20);Di2015NewLineSale.Rows.Add("a",30);Di2015NewLineSale.Rows.Add("b",25);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDataTable Return=new DataTable("Return");Di2015NewLineReturn.Columns.Add("department",typeof(string));Di2015NewLineReturn.Columns.Add("return",typeof(double));Di2015NewLineReturn.Rows.Add("a",21);Di2015NewLineReturn.Rows.Add("a",23);Di2015NewLineReturn.Rows.Add("a",24);Di2015NewLineReturn.Rows.Add("c",29);Di2015NewLine
7469323Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar salesData = from b in Sale.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine                join a in Return.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine                on b["department"] equals a["department"]Di2015NewLine                group new {b,a} by b.Field<string>("department") into gDi2015NewLine                select new {Di2015NewLine                    departmentId=g.Key,Di2015NewLine                    departmentCount=g.Count(),Di2015NewLine                    saleSum=g.Sum(x=>x.b.Field<double>("sale")),Di2015NewLine                    returnSum=g.Sum(x=>x.a.Field<double>("return"))Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine
7469323Di2015UniqueSeparator// Calculate the sale totalsDi2015NewLinevar SaleSums = from b in Sale.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine           group b by b.Field<string>("department") into gDi2015NewLine           select new {Di2015NewLine                department=g.Key,Di2015NewLine                sale=g.Sum(x=>x.Field<double>("sale"))Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Calculate the return totalsDi2015NewLinevar ReturnSums = from a in Return.AsEnumerable() Di2015NewLine           group a by a.Field<string>("department") into gDi2015NewLine           select new {Di2015NewLine               department=g.Key,Di2015NewLine               Return=g.Sum(x=>x.Field<double>("return"))Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// do a left outer join to find all the sale totals with the matching (if present) return totalsDi2015NewLinevar leftData= from b in SaleSumsDi2015NewLine                join a in ReturnSumsDi2015NewLine                on b.department equals a.department into leftDi2015NewLine                from l in left.DefaultIfEmpty()Di2015NewLine                select new {a=l,b};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// do a left outer join to find all the return totals without the matching sale totalsDi2015NewLine// (hence the r==null check)Di2015NewLinevar rightData=  from a in ReturnSumsDi2015NewLine                join b in SaleSumsDi2015NewLine                on a.department equals b.department into rightDi2015NewLine                from r in right.DefaultIfEmpty()Di2015NewLine                where r == nullDi2015NewLine                select new {a,b=r};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar salesData = from d in leftData.Union(rightData)         Di2015NewLine                select new {Di2015NewLine                    department=d.a==null ? d.b.department : d.a.department,Di2015NewLine                    sale=d.b==null ? 0 : d.b.sale,Di2015NewLine                    Return = d.a==null ? 0 : d.a.ReturnDi2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine

7476427Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction parse_signed_request($signed_request, $secret) {Di2015NewLinelist($encoded_sig, $payload) = explode('.', $signed_request, 2); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// decode the dataDi2015NewLine$sig = base64_url_decode($encoded_sig);Di2015NewLine$data = json_decode(base64_url_decode($payload), true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (strtoupper($data['algorithm']) !== 'HMAC-SHA256') {Di2015NewLine  error_log('Unknown algorithm. But to use theseDi2015NewLine    /// constants with C#, a new enumeration _type is defined.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public enum TernaryRasterOperationsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SRCCOPY = 0x00CC0020, // dest = sourceDi2015NewLine        SRCPAINT = 0x00EE0086, // dest = source OR destDi2015NewLine        SRCAND = 0x008800C6, // dest = source AND destDi2015NewLine        SRCINVERT = 0x00660046, // dest = source XOR destDi2015NewLine        SRCERASE = 0x00440328, // dest = source AND (NOT dest)Di2015NewLine        NOTSRCCOPY = 0x00330008, // dest = (NOT source)Di2015NewLine        NOTSRCERASE = 0x001100A6, // dest = (NOT src) AND (NOT dest)Di2015NewLine        MERGECOPY = 0x00C000CA, // dest = (source AND pattern)Di2015NewLine        MERGEPAINT = 0x00BB0226, // dest = (NOT source) OR destDi2015NewLine        PATCOPY = 0x00F00021, // dest = patternDi2015NewLine        PATPAINT = 0x00FB0A09, // dest = DPSnooDi2015NewLine        PATINVERT = 0x005A0049, // dest = pattern XOR destDi2015NewLine        DSTINVERT = 0x00550009, // dest = (NOT dest)Di2015NewLine        BLACKNESS = 0x00000042, // dest = BLACKDi2015NewLine        WHITENESS = 0x00FF0062, // dest = WHITEDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Enumeration to be used for those Win32 function Di2015NewLine    /// that 7487221Di2015UniqueSeparatorIsOdd = (index & 1) == 1Di2015NewLine
7487221Di2015UniqueSeparatorIsIndexOdd = index % 2 != 0Di2015NewLine
7487221Di2015UniqueSeparator var checksum =Di2015NewLine     new [] {Di2015NewLine         codeDi2015NewLine            .Reverse()Di2015NewLine            .Select((c, index) => new {Di2015NewLine                IsIndexOdd = index % 2 != 0,Di2015NewLine                Value = (int) Char.GetNumericValue(c)Di2015NewLine            })Di2015NewLine            .Select(x => x.IsIndexOdd ? x.Value : 3 * x.Value)Di2015NewLine            .Aggregate((a, b) => a + b)Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     .Select(x => new { Rounded = ((x + 10 - 1) / 10) * 10, Intermediate = x })Di2015NewLine     .Select(x => x.Rounded - x.Intermediate)Di2015NewLine     .Single();Di2015NewLine

7491045Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Timer StartTimer(TimeSpan frequency, string timerName, bool alignToHour)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (alignToHour)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Timer(OnTimerTick, timerName, ComputeDelay(frequency), frequency);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Timer(OnTimerTick, timerName, TimeSpan.Zero, frequency);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7491045Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void OnTimerTick(object state)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine((string)state + " " + DateTime.Now.ToString("H:mm"));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7491045Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TimeSpan ComputeDelay(TimeSpan frequency)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (frequency > TimeSpan.FromHours(1.0) || Di2015NewLine        frequency < TimeSpan.FromMinutes(1.0))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine            "The frequency cannot be more than one hour or less than one minute!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return frequency - TimeSpan.FromMinutes(DateTime.Now.Minute % frequency.Minutes);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7499418Di2015UniqueSeparator<h2>Di2015NewLine<span id="Deployments" class="mw-headline">Deployments</span>Di2015NewLine</h2>Di2015NewLine<p>Di2015NewLine    <!-- ... -->Di2015NewLine    <b>SBS8987B</b>Di2015NewLine    (SLBP 192/194*)Di2015NewLine    <br>Di2015NewLine    <b>SBS8988Z</b>Di2015NewLine    (SLBP 192/194*) - F&N NutriSoy Fresh Milk: Singapore's No. 1 Soya Milk! 7499418Di2015UniqueSeparatorb
7499418Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string GetVehicleInfo(string reg)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var url = "http://sgwiki.com/wiki/Scania_K230UB_%28Batch_1_Euro_V%29";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // HtmlWeb is a helper class to get pages from the webDi2015NewLine    var web = new HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlWeb();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create an HtmlDocument from the contents found at given urlDi2015NewLine    var doc = web.Load(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create an XPath to find the `b` elements which contain the registration numbersDi2015NewLine    var xpath = "//h2[span/@id='Deployments']" // find the `h2` element that has a span with the id, 'Deployments' (the header)Di2015NewLine              + "/following-sibling::p[1]"     // move to the first `p` element (where the actual content is in) after the headerDi2015NewLine              + "/b";                          // select the `b` elementsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the elements from the specified XPathDi2015NewLine    var deployments = doc.DocumentNode.SelectNodes(xpath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a LINQ query to find the  requested registration number and generate a resultDi2015NewLine    var query =Di2015NewLine        from b in deployments                 // from the list of registration numbersDi2015NewLine        where b.InnerText == reg              // find the registration we're looking forDi2015NewLine        select reg + b.NextSibling.InnerText; // and create the result combining the registration number with the description (the text following the `b` element)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The query should yield exactly one result (or we have a problem) or none (null)Di2015NewLine    var content = query.SingleOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Decode the content (to convert stuff like "&" to "&")Di2015NewLine    var decoded = System.Net.WebUtility.HtmlDecode(content);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return decoded;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7499776Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TokenDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, string> _attributes = new Dictionary<string, string>(StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine    public string InnerText { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string this[string attributeName]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string val;Di2015NewLine            _attributes.TryGetValue(attributeName, out val);Di2015NewLine            return val;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Token(string innerText, IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, string>> values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InnerText = innerText;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _attributes.Add(item.Key, item.Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetInteger(string name, int defaultValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string val;Di2015NewLine        int result;Di2015NewLine        if (_attributes.TryGetValue(name, out val) && int.TryParse(val, out result))Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        return defaultValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7499776Di2015UniqueSeparator<Year(?>\\s*(?<aname>\\w*?)\\s*=\\s*"(?<aval>[^"]*)"\\s*)*>(?<itext>.*?)</Year>Di2015NewLine
7499776Di2015UniqueSeparator<{0}\\s*(?>(?<aname>\\w*?)\\s*=\\s*"(?<aval>[^"]*)"\\s*)*>(?<itext>.*?)</{0}>Di2015NewLine<{0}\\s*(?>(?<aname>\\w*?)\\s*=\\s*"(?<aval>[^"]*)"\\s*)*/>Di2015NewLine
7499776Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyMarkupDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // These are used to build up the regex.Di2015NewLine    const string RegexInnerText = @"<{0}\\s*(?>(?<aname>\\w*?)\\s*=\\s*""(?<aval>[^""]*)""\\s*)*>(?<itext>.*?)</{0}>";Di2015NewLine    const string RegexNoInnerText = @"<{0}\\s*(?>(?<aname>\\w*?)\\s*=\\s*""(?<aval>[^""]*)""\\s*)*/>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static LinkedList<Tuple<Regex, MatchEvaluator>> _replacers = new LinkedList<Tuple<Regex, MatchEvaluator>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static MyMarkup()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Register("year", false, tok =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var count = tok.GetInteger("digits", 4);Di2015NewLine            var yr = DateTime.Now.Year.ToString();Di2015NewLine            if (yr.Length > count)Di2015NewLine                yr = yr.Substring(yr.Length - count);Di2015NewLine            return yr;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Register(string tagName, bool supportsInnerText, Func<Token, string> replacement)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var eval = CreateEvaluator(replacement);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the no inner text variant.Di2015NewLine        _replacers.AddLast(Tuple.Create(CreateRegex(tagName, RegexNoInnerText), eval));Di2015NewLine        // Add the inner text variant.Di2015NewLine        if (supportsInnerText)Di2015NewLine            _replacers.AddLast(Tuple.Create(CreateRegex(tagName, RegexInnerText), eval));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Regex CreateRegex(string tagName, string format)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Regex(string.Format(format, Regex.Escape(tagName)), RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Execute(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var replacer in _replacers)Di2015NewLine            input = replacer.Item1.Replace(input, replacer.Item2);Di2015NewLine        return input;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static MatchEvaluator CreateEvaluator(Func<Token, string> replacement)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return match =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Grab the groups/values.Di2015NewLine            var aname = match.Groups["aname"];Di2015NewLine            var aval = match.Groups["aval"];Di2015NewLine            var itext = match.Groups["itext"].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Turn aname and aval into a KeyValuePair.Di2015NewLine            var attrs = Enumerable.Range(0, aname.Captures.Count)Di2015NewLine                .Select(i => new KeyValuePair<string, string>(aname.Captures[i].Value, aval.Captures[i].Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return replacement(new Token(itext, attrs));Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7501465Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ExtensionConfigurationElement<TConfigSection, UDefaultValue>Di2015NewLine    where UDefaultValue : new() Di2015NewLine    where TConfigSection : ConfigurationElement, new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public UDefaultValue GetDefaultValue(string strField)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TConfigSection tConfigSection = new TConfigSection();Di2015NewLine        ConfigurationElement configElement = tConfigSection as ConfigurationElement;Di2015NewLine        if (configElement == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // not a config sectionDi2015NewLine            System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(false);Di2015NewLine            return default(UDefaultValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ElementInformation elementInfo = configElement.ElementInformation;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var varTest = elementInfo.Properties;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in varTest)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyInformation propertyInformation = item as PropertyInformation;Di2015NewLine            if (propertyInformation == null || propertyInformation.Name != strField)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                UDefaultValue defaultValue = (UDefaultValue) propertyInformation.DefaultValue;Di2015NewLine                return defaultValue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // default value of the wrong typeDi2015NewLine                System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(false);Di2015NewLine                return default(UDefaultValue);                Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return default(UDefaultValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7508893Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool IsRepeated(string msg, string otherMsg)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (otherMsg.Length < msg.Length || otherMsg.Length % msg.Length != 0)Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < otherMsg.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (otherMsg[i] != msg[i % msg.Length])Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7514048Di2015UniqueSeparator private void lock_ManipulationCompleted(object sender, ManipulationCompletedEventArgs  Di2015NewLine  e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.gridTranslate.TranslateY< 0.0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IEasingFunction function;Di2015NewLine            this.CoastGrid.Stop();                   Di2015NewLine                ((CircleEase)function).Ease(1.0);                  Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {                 Di2015NewLine                this.coastY.Value = 0.0;Di2015NewLine                function = new BounceEase(); 7521154Di2015UniqueSeparator// Start with a method that takes a predicate and retrieves the property namesDi2015NewLinestatic IEnumerable<string> GetColumnNames<T>(Expression<Func<T,bool>> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Use Expression.Body to gather the necessary detailsDi2015NewLine    var members = GetMemberExpressions(predicate.Body);Di2015NewLine    if (!members.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Di2015NewLine            "Not reducible to a Member Access", Di2015NewLine            "predicate");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return members.Select(m => m.Member.Name);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7521154Di2015UniqueSeparatorMemberExpression
7521154Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<MemberExpression> GetMemberExpressions(Expression body)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // A Queue preserves left to right reading order of expressions in the treeDi2015NewLine    var candidates = new Queue<Expression>(new[] { body });Di2015NewLine    while (candidates.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var expr = candidates.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        if (expr is MemberExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return ((MemberExpression)expr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (expr is UnaryExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            candidates.Enqueue(((UnaryExpression)expr).Operand);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (expr is BinaryExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var binary = expr as BinaryExpression;Di2015NewLine            candidates.Enqueue(binary.Left);Di2015NewLine            candidates.Enqueue(binary.Right);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (expr is MethodCallExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var method = expr as MethodCallExpression;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var argument in method.Arguments)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                candidates.Enqueue(argument);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (expr is LambdaExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            candidates.Enqueue(((LambdaExpression)expr).Body);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7530762Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NormallyOpenTimedLatchDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private TimeSpan m_Timeout;Di2015NewLine    private bool m_Open = true;Di2015NewLine    private object m_LockObject = new object();Di2015NewLine    private DateTime m_TimeOfLastClose = DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NormallyOpenTimedLatch(TimeSpan timeout)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_Timeout = timeout;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Wait()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (m_LockObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (!m_Open)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Wait(m_LockObject);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Open()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (m_LockObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_Open = true;Di2015NewLine            Monitor.PulseAll(m_LockObject);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Close()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (m_LockObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_TimeOfLastClose = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLine            if (m_Open)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                new Timer(OnTimerCallback, null, (long)m_Timeout.TotalMilliseconds, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            m_Open = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnTimerCallback(object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (m_LockObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TimeSpan span = DateTime.UtcNow - m_TimeOfLastClose;Di2015NewLine            if (span > m_Timeout)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Open();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TimeSpan interval = m_Timeout - span;Di2015NewLine                new Timer(OnTimerCallback, null, (long)interval.TotalMilliseconds, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7532407Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring addAltTag(string html) {Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    int pos=0;Di2015NewLine    int lastPos=0;Di2015NewLine    while(pos>=0) {Di2015NewLine       int nextpos;Di2015NewLine       pos=html.IndexOf("<img",pos);Di2015NewLine       if (pos>=0) {Di2015NewLine          // images can't have children, and there should not be any angle braces Di2015NewLine          // anyhere in the attributes, so should work fineDi2015NewLine          nextPos =html.IndexOf(">",pos);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       if (nextPos>0) {Di2015NewLine          // back up if XML formedDi2015NewLine          if (html.indexOf(nextPos-1,1)=="/") {Di2015NewLine            nextPos--;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine           // output everything from last position up to butDi2015NewLine           // before the closing caretDi2015NewLine           sb.Append(html.Substring(lastPos,nextPos-lastPos-1);Di2015NewLine           // can't just look for "alt" could be in the image url or class nameDi2015NewLine           if (html.Substring(pos,nextPos-pos).IndexOf(" alt=\\"")<0) {Di2015NewLine               sb.Append(" alt="\\"\\"");Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           lastPos=nextPos;Di2015NewLine       } else {Di2015NewLine           // unclosed image -- just quitDi2015NewLine           pos=-1;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(html.Substring(lastPos);Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7532994Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Dictionary<object, Func<TrackingRecord, DbCommand>> conversionFunctions = new Dictionary<object, Func<TrackingRecord, DbCommand>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void RegisterConversionFunction<T>(Func<T, DbCommand> conversionFunction) where T : TrackingRecordDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    conversionFunctions.Add(typeof(T), tr => conversionFunction((T)tr));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic DbCommand GetConverstion<T>(T trackingRecord) where T : TrackingRecordDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DbCommand command = null;Di2015NewLine    Func<TrackingRecord, DbCommand> conversionFunction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (conversionFunctions.TryGetValue(typeof(T), out conversionFunction))Di2015NewLine        command = conversionFunction.Invoke(trackingRecord);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        command = DefaultConversion(trackingRecord);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return command;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7534327Di2015UniqueSeparator       A   |       B      |  C  |      DDi2015NewLine1 | Claude | =RIGHT(A1,1) | 'a' | =1*(B1=C1)Di2015NewLine2 |        | =RIGHT(A1,1) | 'e' | =1*(B2=C2)Di2015NewLine3 |        | =RIGHT(A1,1) | 'i' | =1*(B3=C3)Di2015NewLine4 |        | =RIGHT(A1,1) | 'n' | =1*(B4=C4)Di2015NewLine5 |        | =RIGHT(A1,1) | 'y' | =1*(B5=C5)Di2015NewLine6 |        |              |     | =SUM(D1:D5)Di2015NewLine

7536335Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Action clientCode = () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var buffer = new byte[100];Di2015NewLine            var clientSocket = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork,Di2015NewLine                                          SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp);Di2015NewLine            clientSocket.Connect(IPAddress.Loopback, 6690);Di2015NewLine            clientSocket.Send(buffer);Di2015NewLine            clientSocket.Disconnect(false);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Client: message sent and socket disconnected.");Di2015NewLine            while (true) {Di2015NewLine                var bytesRead = clientSocket.Receive(buffer);Di2015NewLine                if (bytesRead == 0) {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Client: read " + bytesRead + " bytes.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            clientSocket.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var server = new TcpListener(IPAddress.Loopback, 6690);Di2015NewLine    var thread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(clientCode));Di2015NewLine    server.Start();Di2015NewLine    thread.Start();Di2015NewLine    var client = server.AcceptTcpClient();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using(NetworkStream stream = client.GetStream()) {Di2015NewLine        using(StreamReader streamReader = new StreamReader(stream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var data = streamReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Server: read " + data.Length + " bytes.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Since we 're here we know that the client has disconnected.Di2015NewLine            // Send the response before StreamReader is disposed, becauseDi2015NewLine            // that will cause the socket itself to be closed as well!Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Server: sending response.");Di2015NewLine            stream.Write(new byte[10], 0, 10);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Server: closing socket.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    server.Stop();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Server: waiting for client thread to complete.");Di2015NewLine    thread.Join();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7539054Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Permutations<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var query =Di2015NewLine        from item in sourceDi2015NewLine        from others in source.SkipOnce(item).Permutations()Di2015NewLine        select new[] { item }.Concat(others);Di2015NewLine    return query.DefaultIfEmpty(Enumerable.Empty<T>());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<T> SkipOnce<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, T itemToSkip)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool skipped = false;Di2015NewLine    var comparer = EqualityComparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!skipped && comparer.Equals(item, itemToSkip))Di2015NewLine            skipped = true;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            yield return item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7539870Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void AssignAllComplexTypeMembers(object instance, ComplexType value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     // If instance itself is null it has no members to which we can assign a valueDi2015NewLine     if (instance != null)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        // Get all fields that are non-static in the instance provided...Di2015NewLine        FieldInfo[] fields = instance.GetType().GetFields(BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (FieldInfo field in fields)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           if (field.FieldType == typeof(ComplexType))Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              // If field is of type ComplexType we assign the provided value to it.Di2015NewLine              field.SetValue(instance, value);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           else if (field.FieldType.IsClass)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              // Otherwise, if the type of the field is a class recursively do this assignment Di2015NewLine              // on the instance contained in that field. (If null this method will perform no action on it)Di2015NewLine              AssignAllComplexTypeMembers(field.GetValue(instance), value);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine
7539870Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach (var instance in data.obj)Di2015NewLine        AssignAllComplexTypeMembers(instance, t);Di2015NewLine
7539870Di2015UniqueSeparatorinstance.GetType().GetProperties(...)

7544428Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static byte[] ReceiveMessage(Stream stream, int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   byte[] buffer = new byte[length];Di2015NewLine   int bufferFill = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   while (true)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      int bytesRead = stream.Read(buffer, bufferFill, buffer.Length - bufferFill);Di2015NewLine      if (bytesRead == 0)Di2015NewLine         throw new Exception("No more data available.");Di2015NewLine      bufferFill += bytesRead;Di2015NewLine      if (buffer.Length == bufferFill)Di2015NewLine         return buffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7546952Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool ContainsSequence(byte[] toSearch, byte[] toFind) {Di2015NewLine  for (var i = 0; i + toFind.Length < toSearch.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine    var allSame = true;Di2015NewLine    for (var j = 0; j < toFind.Length; j++) {Di2015NewLine      if (toSearch[i + j] != toFind[j]) {Di2015NewLine        allSame = false;Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (allSame) {Di2015NewLine      return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7547779Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> GetWebSitesRunningOnApplicationPool(ManagementScope scope, string applicationPoolName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //get application names from application poolDi2015NewLine    string path = string.Format("IIsApplicationPool.Name='W3SVC/APPPOOLS/{0}'", applicationPoolName);Di2015NewLine    ManagementPath managementPath = new ManagementPath(path);Di2015NewLine    ManagementObject classInstance = new ManagementObject(scope, managementPath, null);Di2015NewLine    ManagementBaseObject outParams = classInstance.InvokeMethod("EnumAppsInPool", null, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //get web server names from application namesDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<string> nameList = (outParams.Properties["Applications"].Value as string[]) //no null reference exception even there is no application runningDi2015NewLine                                   .Where(item => !String.IsNullOrEmpty(item)) //but you get empty strings so they are filteredDi2015NewLine                                   .ToList() //you get something like /LM/W3SVC/1/ROOTDi2015NewLine                                   .Select(item => item.Slice(item.NthIndexOf("/", 2) + 1, item.NthIndexOf("/", 4))); //your WebServer.Name is between 2nd and 4th slahesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //get server comments from namesDi2015NewLine    List<string> serverCommentList = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (string name in nameList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ManagementObjectSearcher searcher =Di2015NewLine            new ManagementObjectSearcher(scope, new ObjectQuery(string.Format("SELECT ServerComment FROM IIsWebServerSetting WHERE Name = '{0}'", name)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        serverCommentList.AddRange(from ManagementObject queryObj in searcher.Get() select queryObj["ServerComment"].ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return serverCommentList;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7547779Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static int NthIndexOf(this string target, string value, int n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int result = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Match m = Regex.Match(target, "((" + value + ").*?){" + n + "}");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (m.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = m.Groups[2].Captures[n - 1].Index;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Slice(this string source, int start, int end)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (end < 0) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            end = source.Length + end;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int len = end - start;               Di2015NewLine        return source.Substring(start, len); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine        this._disposables = new List<IDisposable>(disposables);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(IDisposable disposable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (disposable == null) { throw new ArgumentNullException("disposable"); }Di2015NewLine        if (remove == null) { throw new ArgumentNullException("remove"); }Di2015NewLine        if (handler == null) { throw new ArgumentNullException("handler"); }Di2015NewLine        add(handler);Di2015NewLine        return this.Add(() => remove(handler));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Clear()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_disposables)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var disposables = _disposables.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            _disposables.Clear();Di2015NewLine            Array.ForEach(disposables, d => d.Dispose());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_disposables)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!_disposed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            _disposed = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<IDisposable> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_disposables)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _disposables.ToArray().AsEnumerable().GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsDisposedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _disposed;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7551246Di2015UniqueSeparatorCreateSalt
7551246Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string CreateHash(string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return CreateHash(password, CreateSalt());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string CreateHash(string password, string salt)     Di2015NewLine{         Di2015NewLine    string saltAndPassword = String.Concat(password, salt);         Di2015NewLine    string hashedPassword = Di2015NewLine        FormsAuthentication.HashPasswordForStoringInConfigFile(Di2015NewLine                         saltAndPassword,"SHA1");         Di2015NewLine    hashedPassword = string.Concat(hashedPassword,salt);         Di2015NewLine    return hashedPassword;     Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool VerifyPassword(string username, Di2015NewLine                    string password,AccountDataContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var user = context.UserAccounts.FirstOrDefault(p => p.UserName == username);Di2015NewLine        if (user != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string salt = user.Password.Substring(user.Password.Length - DefaultSaltSize);Di2015NewLine            string hashedPassword = CreateHash(password, salt);Di2015NewLine            return hashedPassword.Equals(user.Password);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7560518Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic unsafe static Bitmap GetBlueImagePerf(Image sourceImage)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int width = sourceImage.Width;Di2015NewLine  int height = sourceImage.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(sourceImage);Di2015NewLine  Bitmap redBmp = new Bitmap(width, height, bmp.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  BitmapData bd = bmp.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, width, height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb);Di2015NewLine  BitmapData bd2 = redBmp.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, width, height), ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb);Di2015NewLine  byte* source = (byte*)bd.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLine  byte* target = (byte*)bd2.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int stride = bd.Stride;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Parallel.For(0, height, (y1) =>Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    byte* s = source + (y1 * stride);Di2015NewLine    byte* t = target + (y1 * stride);Di2015NewLine    for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // use t[1], s[1] to access green channelDi2015NewLine      // use t[2], s[2] to access red channelDi2015NewLine      t[0] = s[0]; Di2015NewLine      t += 4;       // Add bytes per pixel to current position.Di2015NewLine      s += 4;       // For other pixel formats this value is different.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  bmp.UnlockBits(bd);Di2015NewLine  redBmp.UnlockBits(bd2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return redBmp;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic unsafe static void DoImageConversion()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Bitmap RedLayer   = GetRedImagePerf(Image.FromFile("image_path1"));Di2015NewLine  Bitmap GreenLayer = GetGreenImagePerf(Image.FromFile("image_path2"));Di2015NewLine  Bitmap BlueLayer  = GetBlueImagePerf(Image.FromFile("image_path3"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Bitmap composite =Di2015NewLine    new Bitmap(RedLayer.Width, RedLayer.Height, RedLayer.PixelFormat);      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  BitmapData bd = composite.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, RedLayer.Width, RedLayer.Height), ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine  byte* comp = (byte*)bd.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  BitmapData bdRed = RedLayer.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, RedLayer.Width, RedLayer.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine  BitmapData bdGreen = GreenLayer.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, RedLayer.Width, RedLayer.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine  BitmapData bdBlue = BlueLayer.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, RedLayer.Width, RedLayer.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  byte* red = (byte*)bdRed.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLine  byte* green = (byte*)bdGreen.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLine  byte* blue = (byte*)bdBlue.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int stride = bdRed.Stride;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Parallel.For(0, bdRed.Height, (y1) =>Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    byte* r = red + (y1 * stride);Di2015NewLine    byte* g = green + (y1 * stride);Di2015NewLine    byte* b = blue + (y1 * stride);Di2015NewLine    byte* c = comp + (y1 * stride);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int x = 0; x < bdRed.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      c[0] = b[0];Di2015NewLine      c[1] = g[1];Di2015NewLine      c[2] = r[2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      r += 4; // Add bytes per pixel to current position.Di2015NewLine      g += 4; // For other pixel formats this value is different.Di2015NewLine      b += 4; // Use Image.GetPixelFormatSize to get number of bits per pixelDi2015NewLine      c += 4;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  composite.Save("save_image_path", ImageFormat.Jpeg);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7562112Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static double GetCosineSimilarity(Point V1, Point V2) {Di2015NewLine return (V1.X*V2.X + V1.Y*V2.Y) Di2015NewLine         / ( Math.Sqrt( Math.Pow(V1.X,2)+Math.Pow(V1.Y,2))Di2015NewLine             Math.Sqrt( Math.Pow(V2.X,2)+Math.Pow(V2.Y,2))Di2015NewLine           );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7562112Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<double>
7562112Di2015UniqueSeparatorV1 = (V1[0], V1[1], V1[2], V1[3])
7562112Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static double GetCosineSimilarity(List<double> V1, List<double> V2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double sim = 0.0d;Di2015NewLine    int N = 0;Di2015NewLine    N = ((V2.Count < V1.Count)?V2.Count : V1.Count);Di2015NewLine    double dot = 0.0d;Di2015NewLine    double mag1 = 0.0d;Di2015NewLine    double mag2 = 0.0d;Di2015NewLine    for (int n = 0; n < N; n++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dot += V1[n] * V2[n];Di2015NewLine        mag1 += Math.Pow(V1[n], 2);Di2015NewLine        mag2 += Math.Pow(V2[n], 2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return dot / (Math.Sqrt(mag1) * Math.Sqrt(mag2));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7567732Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> stringList = new List<string> { "00012345.pdf","12345.pdf","notaduplicate.jpg","3453456363234.jpg"};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEqualityComparer<string> comparer = new NumericFilenameEqualityComparer ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var duplicates = stringList.GroupBy (s => s, comparer).Where(grp => grp.Count() > 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // do something with grouped duplicates...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Not safe for null's !Di2015NewLine// NB do you own parameter / null checks / string-case options etc !Di2015NewLinepublic class NumericFilenameEqualityComparer : IEqualityComparer<string> {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   private static Regex digitFilenameRegex = new Regex(@"\\d+", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public bool Equals(string left, string right) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Match leftDigitsMatch = digitFilenameRegex.Match(left);Di2015NewLine        Match rightDigitsMatch = digitFilenameRegex.Match(right);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        long leftValue = leftDigitsMatch.Success ? long.Parse(leftDigitsMatch.Value) : long.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine        long rightValue = rightDigitsMatch.Success ? long.Parse(rightDigitsMatch.Value) : long.MaxValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return leftValue == rightValue;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public int GetHashCode(string value) {Di2015NewLine        return base.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7569974Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring document = "... some server document file name ...";Di2015NewLinestring fullpath = Server.MapPath("your path"+document);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineResponse.ContentType = ExtentionToContentType(document);Di2015NewLineResponse.AddHeader("Content-Disposition", string.Format("attachment; filename={0}", document));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebyte[] data = System.IO.File.ReadAllBytes(fullpath);Di2015NewLineResponse.AppendHeader("Content-Length", data.Length.ToString());Di2015NewLineResponse.BinaryWrite(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineResponse.End();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string ExtentionToContentType(string file)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (System.IO.Path.GetExtension(file).ToLower())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case ".xls": return "application/vnd.ms-excel";Di2015NewLine        case ".doc": case ".docx": return "application/msword";Di2015NewLine        case ".ppt": return "application/vnd.ms-powerpoint";Di2015NewLine        case ".mdb": return "application/x-msaccess";Di2015NewLine        case ".zip": return "application/zip";Di2015NewLine        case ".jpg": case ".jpeg":  case ".jpe": return "image/jpeg";Di2015NewLine        case ".tiff": return "image/tiff";Di2015NewLine        case ".bmp": return "image/bmp";Di2015NewLine        case ".png": return "image/png";Di2015NewLine        case ".gif": return "image/gif";Di2015NewLine        case ".avi": return "video/x-msvideo";Di2015NewLine        case ".mpeg": return "video/mpeg";Di2015NewLine        case ".rtf": case ".rtx": return "text/richtext";Di2015NewLine        case ".txt": return "text/plain";Di2015NewLine        case ".pdf": return "application/pdf";Di2015NewLine        default: return "application/x-binary";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

         int r = GetIpAddrTable(pBuf, ref nBufSize, false);Di2015NewLine                if (r != 0)Di2015NewLine                    throw new 7574146Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Function RunElevated(commandLine As String, Optional ByVal timeout As Integer = 0) As BooleanDi2015NewLine    Dim startInfo As New ProcessStartInfoDi2015NewLine    startInfo.UseShellExecute = TrueDi2015NewLine    startInfo.WorkingDirectory = Environment.CurrentDirectoryDi2015NewLine    Dim uri As New Uri(Assembly.GetEntryAssembly.GetName.CodeBase)Di2015NewLine    startInfo.FileName = uri.LocalPathDi2015NewLine    startInfo.Verb = "runas"Di2015NewLine    startInfo.Arguments = commandLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim success As BooleanDi2015NewLine    TryDi2015NewLine        Dim p As Process = Process.Start(startInfo)Di2015NewLine        ' wait thirty seconds for completionDi2015NewLine        If timeout > 0 ThenDi2015NewLine            If Not p.WaitForExit(30000) ThenDi2015NewLine                ' did not complete in thirty seconds, so killDi2015NewLine                p.Kill()Di2015NewLine                success = FalseDi2015NewLine            ElseDi2015NewLine                success = TrueDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            p.WaitForExit()Di2015NewLine            success = TrueDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    Catch ex As Win32ExceptionDi2015NewLine        success = FalseDi2015NewLine    Catch ex As ExceptionDi2015NewLine        MsgBox("Error occurred while trying to start application as administrator: " & ex.Message)Di2015NewLine        success = FalseDi2015NewLine    End TryDi2015NewLine    Return successDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePublic Function IsAdmin() As BooleanDi2015NewLine    Dim id As WindowsIdentity = WindowsIdentity.GetCurrentDi2015NewLine    Dim p As New WindowsPrincipal(id)Di2015NewLine    Return p.IsInRole(WindowsBuiltInRole.Administrator)Di2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

7575648Di2015UniqueSeparator  private UdpClient udpClientR;Di2015NewLine  private Thread t1;Di2015NewLine  void StartUpd()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     udpClientR = new UdpClient();Di2015NewLine     udpClientR.Connect(Settings.rxIPAddress, PORT_RX_LOCAL);Di2015NewLine     t1 = new Thread(() => UdpReceiveThread(PORT_RX_REMOTE)) { IsBackground = true };Di2015NewLine     t1.Start();Di2015NewLine     // Give it some time here to startup, incase you call StopUpd too soonDi2015NewLine     Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void StopUpd()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     udpClientR.Close();Di2015NewLine     // Wait for the thread to exit.  Calling Close above should stop anyDi2015NewLine     // Read block you have in the UdpReceiveThread function.  Once theDi2015NewLine     // thread dies, you can safely assume its closed and can call StartUpd againDi2015NewLine     while (t1.IsAlive) { Thread.Sleep(10); }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

Do not call TService.Close() or TService.Abort() within the action lambda.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="TService">The type of the service to use</typeparam>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="action">Lambda of the action to performwith the service</param>Di2015NewLine        [System.Diagnostics.DebuggerStepThrough]Di2015NewLine        public static void UsingProxy<TService>(Action<TService> action)Di2015NewLine            where TService : ICommunicationObject, IDisposable, new()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var service = new TService();Di2015NewLine            bool success = false;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                action(service);Di2015NewLine                if (service.State != CommunicationState.Faulted)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    service.Close();Di2015NewLine                    success = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!success)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    service.Abort();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// WCF proxys do not clean up properly if they throw an exception. This method ensures that the service Di2015NewLine        /// proxy is handeled correctly. Do not call TService.Close() or TService.Abort() within the action lambda.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="TIServiceContract">The type of the service contract to use</typeparam>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="action">Action to perform with the client instance.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <remarks>In the configuration, an endpoint with names that maches the <typeparamref name="TIServiceContract"/> nameDi2015NewLine        /// must exists. Otherwise, use <see cref="UsingContract<TIServiceContract>(string endpointName, Action<TIServiceContract> action)"/>. </remarks>Di2015NewLine        [System.Diagnostics.DebuggerStepThrough]Di2015NewLine        public static void UsingContract<TIServiceContract>(Action<TIServiceContract> action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            UsingContract<TIServiceContract>(Di2015NewLine                typeof(TIServiceContract).Name,Di2015NewLine                actionDi2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// WCF proxys do not clean up properly if they throw an exception. This method ensures that the service Di2015NewLine        /// proxy is handeled correctly. Do not call TService.Close() or TService.Abort() within the action lambda.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="TIServiceContract">The type of the service contract to use</typeparam>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="action">Action to perform with the client instance.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="endpointName">Name of the endpoint to use</param>Di2015NewLine        [System.Diagnostics.DebuggerStepThrough]Di2015NewLine        public static void UsingContract<TIServiceContract>(Di2015NewLine              string endpointName,Di2015NewLine              Action<TIServiceContract> action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var cf = new ChannelFactory<TIServiceContract>(endpointName);Di2015NewLine            var channel = cf.CreateChannel();Di2015NewLine            var clientChannel = (IClientChannel)channel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool success = false;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                action(channel);Di2015NewLine                if (clientChannel.State != CommunicationState.Faulted)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    clientChannel.Close();Di2015NewLine                    success = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!success) clientChannel.Abort();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
